Title: AKA Sin Bin
Writer: Brian Michael Bendis (based on the character from the Marvel comics by), Michael Gaydos (based on the character from the Marvel comics by), Melissa Rosenberg (created by), Jamie King, Dana Baratta, Jenna Reback (staff writer)
Actors: Krysten Ritter, Rachael Taylor, Wil Traval, Erin Moriarty
Plot: Just when Jessica has Kilgrave right where she wants him, Hogarth's involvement complicates the situation. Details of Kilgrave's past emerge.
